transcript.text: [Music]
hey guys see that little pair of

no heaters
no sleeping bags

we're gonna need every ounce of

to get our shelter built
and get enough firewood

real cold

hopefully that won't be an issue
but if it is

so you're stripping off layers when

you want to stack your wood around the

but of course you don't want it too
